text: You were saying something about different exit ways coming in the buildings. Why would you need a door to open outwards as opposed to opening into the building? Yeah, so when you have a certain amount of people in 50 is a number really. So if you have less than 50 people, the fire-oids of door can open inwards. But if you get more than 50 people, then the fire-aids of door must open outwards, so that when the people escaping, they're going in the direction of travel that they need to give you their uncle.
